posts.title: Web Development Internship
posts.description: We are looking for a motivated web development intern to join our team. You'll work on real projects and gain valuable experience in front-end and back-end technologies.
responsibilities: Develop responsive web applications using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
Collaborate with the design team to implement user interfaces
Write clean, maintainable code following best practices
Participate in code reviews and team meetings
posts.about_company: Tech Solutions Inc. is a leading technology company specializing in web development and digital solutions. We work with clients across various industries to create innovative web applications.
posts.eligibility: Students pursuing B.Tech/B.E in Computer Science or related fields. Basic knowledge of web technologies required.

posts.title: Investigations Specialist
posts.description: About the Job: Security is at the core of Google's design and development process. As an Investigations Specialist on the Security Investigations and Assessments (SIA) team...
posts.location: Bengaluru, Karnataka, India; Gurgaon, Haryana, India; Hyderabad, Telangana, India
responsibilities: Conduct investigations into security incidents including information and physical security policy violations
Perform evidence gathering and analysis through various investigative methods
Assess potential internal threats and evaluate risks to Google's assets and personnel
Develop and implement strategies to mitigate identified security risks
posts.about_company: Google is a global technology leader focused on improving the ways people connect with information. Our innovations in web search and advertising have made our website a top internet property and our brand one of the most recognized in the world.
posts.eligibility: Minimum Qualifications Required: Bachelor's degree or equivalent practical experience in investigations field. Minimum 6 years of professional experience...
posts.salary: Competitive salary with comprehensive benefits package
posts.selection_process: Multiple interview rounds including technical assessments and case studies

posts.title: GATE 2024 Examination
posts.description: Graduate Aptitude Test in Engineering (GATE) 2024 notification released. The examination will be conducted by IIT Bombay for admission to M.Tech programs in IITs, NITs, and other prestigious institutions.
posts.eligibility: Bachelor's degree in Engineering/Technology or Master's degree in relevant science subjects. There is no age limit for appearing in GATE 2024.

posts.title: Campus Recruitment Drive 2024
posts.description: Annual campus recruitment drive will be conducted on January 25th, 2024. Top companies from IT, Core Engineering, and Management sectors will participate.
posts.notice_details: All final year students are required to attend with their resumes, academic documents, and project details. Dress code: Formal attire. Students must register through the placement portal before the deadline. Late registrations will not be entertained.
